query: INSERT INTO player_units (user_id, unit_id, nickname, current_level, current_xp, current_attack, current_defense, current_health, is_in_party, rarity) SELECT $1, u.unit_id, u.name, 1, 0, u.base_attack, u.base_defense, u.base_health, TRUE, u.rarity FROM units u WHERE u.unit_id = $2 ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
